body: Okay, got to busy fapping and stopped paying attention to the story part way in so correct me if I'm wrong; The first guy (the cuck) is sleeping with the daughter of the women who betrayed Jinbo (the stud), who created an elaborate series of events to fuck the girl from his childhood and her daughter, however the daughter was already pregnant from the Cuck(?) but the Stud thought it was his.  The kid then becomes the third guy (Stud 2, Electric Boogaloo), who gets recalled to the mansion by the maids after the Stud Kills himself so that they can enslave him but the Stud's actual child who got swapped at birth for the Stud 2(?) and so the maids didn't hate her that much but still fucked her up. This is honestly the most round about way to reach an incest plot line. 5/7 added to favorites and may fap again but probably not
